tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fuel_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    fuel_date DATE,
    fuel_quantity FLOAT,
    fuel_cost FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_make VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_capacity DECIMAL,
    fuel_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_entries (
    entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    entry_date DATE,
    fuel_amount DECIMAL,
    fuel_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_consumption_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  fuel_type VARCHAR,
  fuel_quantity INT,
  fuel_cost DECIMAL,
  fuel_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
    log_date DATE,
    fuel_amount FLOAT,
    fuel_cost FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT REFERENCES fuel_logs(log_id),
    station_id INT REFERENCES fuel_stations(station_id),
    fuel_type_id INT REFERENCES fuel_types(fuel_type_id),
    fuel_amount FLOAT,
    fuel_cost FLOAT
);
